link-text: Unfuck Your Habitat: UfYH Top Tens
link-description:
unfuckyourhabitat:

Top ten cleaning products:

  1. Vinegar
  2. Baking soda
  3. Mr. Clean Magic Eraser
  4. Bar Keepers Friend
  5. Comet
  6. A steam mop
  7. Swiffer dry mop (you can replace the disposable cloths with a microfiber cloth)
  8. Scrub brushes
  9. Goo Gone
  10. Rubbing alcohol
